title: How to Make Lentil and Orange Salad

steps.headline: Boil the lentils.
steps.description: Fill the saucepan with lentils and bring to the boil. Boil for 30-40 minutes. Drain, then leave to cool.

steps.headline: Wash the spinach.
steps.description: Drain and chop it into small pieces.

steps.headline: Mix together the yogurt and orange juice.
Toast the sesame seeds.
steps.description: In a frying pan or skillet, add the sesame seeds and cumin seeds. Dry fry for 3-4 minutes; do not allow to burn.

steps.headline: Add the cooled lentils and the orange juice and yogurt mixture.
Place the spinach pieces across a large serving plate.
steps.description: Arrange the orange segments across the plate.

steps.headline: Add the lentils in the middle of the arranged spinach and orange segments.
Done.
steps.description: The salad is now ready to serve.

text: Preparing the Ingredients Boil the lentils. Fill the saucepan with lentils and bring to the boil. Boil for 30-40 minutes. Drain, then leave to cool. Wash the spinach. Drain and chop it into small pieces. Mix together the yogurt and orange juice.  Toast the sesame seeds. In a frying pan or skillet, add the sesame seeds and cumin seeds. Dry fry for 3-4 minutes; do not allow to burn. Making the Salad Add the cooled lentils and the orange juice and yogurt mixture. Mix through. Place the spinach pieces across a large serving plate. Arrange the orange segments across the plate. Add the lentils in the middle of the arranged spinach and orange segments.  Done. The salad is now ready to serve. Finished.
